title: Spaghetti Bolognese
info: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
steps: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef, cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Alfredo
info: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken over fettuccine pasta.
steps: Cook fettuccine pasta as directed.
Grill seasoned chicken breast, slice into strips.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic.
Pour in heavy cream, add parmesan cheese.
Combine cooked pasta, top with grilled chicken.

title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
info: Colorful and healthy stir-fry with a mix of fresh vegetables.
steps: Stir-fry broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers.
Add cubed tofu, cook until golden.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Toss to combine, cook for a few more minutes.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
info: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
steps: Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread olive oil on the dough.
Layer sliced tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil leaves.
Bake in a preheated oven until crust is golden.
Sprinkle with salt before serving.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
info: Comforting soup with chicken, vegetables, and noodles.
steps: Simmer chicken thighs in broth until cooked.
Add chopped carrots, celery, and onions.
Cook until vegetables are tender.
Boil egg noodles separately, add to the soup.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

title: Caesar Salad
info: Classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
steps: Chop and wash romaine lettuce.
Grill seasoned chicken breast, slice it.
Toss lettuce with croutons, parmesan, and chicken.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing, squeeze lemon.
Mix well and serve.

title: Vegan Lentil Curry
info: Flavorful and nutritious lentil curry with a variety of spices.
steps: Cook lentils in coconut milk until tender.
Sauté onions and garlic until golden.
Add diced tomatoes and curry powder.
Combine with cooked lentils, simmer until flavors meld.
Serve over rice.

title: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
info: Tender pulled pork smothered in barbecue sauce, served in a bun.
steps: Rub pork shoulder with brown sugar, slow cook until tender.
Shred the cooked pork and mix with barbecue sauce.
Toast buns, spoon pulled pork onto them.
Top with coleslaw and pickles.
Serve with extra barbecue sauce on the side.

title: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
info: Lemony garlic butter sauce with succulent shrimp over pasta.
steps: Cook linguine pasta al dente.
Sauté shrimp in garlic and butter until pink.
Deglaze with white wine, squeeze lemon juice.
Toss cooked pasta in the sauce.
Garnish with fresh parsley.

title: Mushroom Risotto
info: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms, Parmesan, and white wine.
steps: Sauté onions and mushrooms in olive oil.
Add arborio rice, cook until translucent.
Pour in white wine, stir until absorbed.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring continuously.
Finish with Parmesan, serve hot.
